desc: Every day this character spends 1 AP and some gold to increase combat stats. Speak to Xeona to disable it.
Every day this character spends 1 AP and some gold to increase magic stats. Speak to Abby to disable it.
Every day this character spends 1 AP and some gold to increase social stats. Speak to Aine to disable it.
Her spirit was broken during obedience training.
She doesn't react, no manifestations of emotion or feeling.
She only responds to external stimuli.
She behaves abjectly submissive.
Her behavior is quite submissive
She lost all will to fight.
She is readily trained and taught.
Her behavior is almost flawless.
She behaves just like she should.
She has been very compliant during her training lately.
She really tries to do her best.
She is carrying equipment that makes it easier to reward her.
She seems more positively responsive.
She does what you want, that's all.
She does what you want, but it takes some coaching.
She usually goes without a fight now.
She doesn't trust you.
Sometimes she listens, but not always.
There is still a little resistance left in her.
She's always complaining.
She refuses more often than not.
You'd better keep an eye on her.
She has been restrained to prevent her from running away.
She refuses to see you as her master.
She just won't even listen to you.
She is carrying equipment that makes it easier to punish her.
She'll hurt you if she can get away with it.
She may take her chances.
Just stay away from her. Far away.
